grounding:
This conversation with Sir Partha Dasgupta, moderated by Annual Review of Economics Editorial Commitee Member Tim Besley, focuses on biodiversity and its implications for economic thought and policy. A video of this interview is available online at 
https://www.annualreviews.org/r/partha_dasgupta_interview
.
generated_text: This paper explores the intricate relationship between biodiversity and economic growth through the lens of Sir Partha Dasgupta's economic theory. It emphasizes the importance of inclusive wealth and asset management in fostering sustainable development and preserving biodiversity.
